related_post.text: ```pyIn [20]: df = pd.DataFrame(dict(a = ['one two three'] b = [1,2,3]))In [21]: df[df['a'] == one']['b'].item()Out[21]: 1In [22]: next(iter(df[df['a'] == one']['b']))Out[22]: 1```can anyone shed some light as to why `.item( )` may have been depreciated in favour of the latter?

so_post.text: here's a thread with a bit of info : <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/57390363/pandasitemhasbeendeprecated>

comments: Seems like Kiahna found the answer to their own question.
